ygData.subject: Re: Gelatenous cube in running eye?
ygData.msgSnippet: Okay the cube is nowhere near there but on the same lvl okay you rember how you come down the ramp go through that first door then the second door then theres
ygData.messageBody:
Okay the cube is nowhere near there but on the same lvl
okay you rember how you come down the ramp go through that first door then
the second door
then theres the guards you go around them to head to kings room well this
time
you don't go into that next door but take a right and you will see water and
path following the way on both sides
you follow the path by taking a left and you go all the way till you come to
some tables and such and you will see a star with
water in it and water around it you have to jump into the star and swim down
sometimes theres some kind of water goblin i forget
the name of it down there wasn't too much trouble for me lvl 30 monk
took me over 15 hours yesterday camping to finally get the goblin in
beholder luckly the one in misty spawned within an hour
good luck

Darder Brainsmasher
Lvl30 Monk Quellious server
----- Original Message -----
From: "xpressnet" <innoriel@...>
To: <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, January 25, 2000 2:16 AM
Subject: [EQ-Monks] Gelatenous cube in running eye?


> From: "xpressnet" <innoriel@...>
>
> Hi all I ned help. I am trying to complete the TREATN fist quest. I have
> all the ingredients except the cat skull cap form the gelatenous cube in
> Running Eye.
>
> I am trying to find the exact location of the gelatenous cube in running
> eye. If anyone here has any ideas as to whre it is (in relation to the
> throne room an the captain spawn) please provide DETAILED explanation.
> Everyone tells me behind the throne room but I just spent all night
> killing everything I could find behind the throne room and I managed to
kill
> two captains in the time that no cube has shown its face.
>
> Ok so as I enter the King I face a door that leeads to the room where the
> captain spawns ( one of the elite guards is the captains place holder)
Now
> does the cube spawn in this "captain room" or in the hall behind the door
> in the back of this "captain room"? Or is he even farther back?
>
> If I am rambling excuse me but I just spent allnight on this damned quest
> with no results... very frustrating....
>
>
